Apostas.title: Your Entry
Apostas.matrixInstruction: Choose and click on the selected forecast so that it is automatically inserted into the registration form.

faq.a1: It is a global decentralized betting protocol, operated entirely by smart contracts on the blockchain network, ensuring no human intervention or result manipulation.
faq.a2: We use Chainlink VRF (Verifiable Random Function) technology, which provides an auditable on-chain source of randomness, ensuring the draw is 100% fair and impossible to predict or manipulate.
faq.q3: How do I receive my prize?
faq.a3: After the draw validation by Chainlink VRF, winners must claim the prize directly on the site. The amount is transferred instantly from the smart contract to your wallet after interaction. This 'pull' model ensures the protocol's sustainability and security.
faq.a4: The matrix of 625 possibilities offers an ideal mathematical balance between probability and accumulated prize, allowing the prize to grow sustainably and transparently for all participants.
faq.a5: No. The contract has immutable governance. Once deployed on the network, the distribution and draw rules cannot be changed by anyone, not even its creators.

Manifesto.title: THE JUSTICE OF THE 90%
Manifesto.headline: THE END OF OPACITY. WELCOME TO THE ERA OF MATHEMATICAL TRANSPARENCY.
Manifesto.p1: While traditional systems retain most of your value in bureaucratic structures, we apply Blockchain efficiency. At Blockchain Bet Brasil, 90% of the gross revenue from each round is guaranteed via Smart Contract for Real Payout to winners.
Manifesto.p2: We are not the 'house'; we are the code that guarantees the integrity of your play.
Manifesto.p3: No intermediaries. No manipulation. No borders. Mathematics is the only Law.
Manifesto.footer: Verified on Base Blockchain | No House Edge

QuinaBet.title: QUINA
QuinaBet.subtitle: Choose 25 prognostics from which 5 matches will be awarded the jackpot.
QuinaBet.rule3: Fixed value of 1 USDC per ticket
QuinaBet.matrixInstruction: Click the 'Random' button below for automatic filling of the 25 forecasts on the slip; click the trash icon on the slip to delete and make manual replacement of unwanted forecast(s).
QuinaBet.volumeHint: Automatic filling as matrix selection progresses
QuinaBet.goldTagline: Absolute dependence on luck is optional.
QuinaBet.highlight1Desc: Verified and audited protocol. No manipulation.
QuinaBet.highlight2Desc: 90% of collected funds will be distributed equally among winners. (In this modality, the prize is exclusive to 5 correct matches).

QuinaBetFAQ.title: HOW IT
QuinaBetFAQ.subtitle: WORKS
QuinaBetFAQ.description: Everything you need to know about Quina-Bet
QuinaBetFAQ.step1Desc: Click each number from 1 to 25 to select your forecasts. Click again to deselect.
QuinaBetFAQ.step1Tip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Use the 'Random' button for automatic selection.
QuinaBetFAQ.step2Desc: After selecting your 25 numbers, connect your wallet and confirm the 1 USDC bet.
QuinaBetFAQ.step2Tip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Check your numbers are correct before confirming.
QuinaBetFAQ.step3Desc: The round ends on Saturday. The draw happens via Chainlink VRF to ensure complete randomness.
QuinaBetFAQ.step3Tip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: You can watch the draw in real-time on the blockchain.
QuinaBetFAQ.step4Desc: If your 25 numbers contain the 5 drawn numbers, you win 100% of the pot!
QuinaBetFAQ.step4Tip: ðŸ’¡ Tip: There are no partial prizes. Only 5/5 matches win.
QuinaBetFAQ.faqSubtitle: Questions about Quina-Bet? Here are the answers.
QuinaBetFAQ.faq1Desc: You choose 25 numbers from 1 to 25. Each number you marked that matches one of the 5 drawn prizes counts as 1 point. The maximum prize is awarded when you complete 5 points on your ticket (all 5 drawn numbers among your 25 choices).
QuinaBetFAQ.faq2Desc: Yes! If no one hits the Quina, the prize rolls over to the next round with a +40% bonus.
QuinaBetFAQ.faq3Title: Is it safe to use Quina-Bet?
QuinaBetFAQ.faq3Desc: Completely. The contract is audited, immutable and operates via Chainlink VRF. Your bet is recorded on the blockchain.
QuinaBetFAQ.faq4Desc: Bets close every Saturday. The draw happens via Chainlink VRF and results are published on Sunday.
QuinaBetFAQ.ctaDesc: Choose your 25 numbers and participate in the next Quina-Bet round.

QuinaBetPrizes.title: PRIZES
QuinaBetPrizes.subtitle: Prize structure focused on the 5/5 Jackpot
QuinaBetPrizes.quinaDesc: The only prize level. Match the 5 drawn numbers among your 25 chosen ones to win everything.
QuinaBetPrizes.quinaSlogan: Choose 25 coordinates and hit the Quina for the maximum prize.
QuinaBetPrizes.rolloverDesc: If there are no winners, +40% in the next round
QuinaBetPrizes.scenario1Desc: 100 bets Ã— 1 USDC = 100 USDC raised. After 10% for protocol, 90 USDC remain.
QuinaBetPrizes.scenario2Desc: 500 bets Ã— 1 USDC = 500 USDC raised. After 10%, 450 USDC remain divided among 2 winners.
QuinaBetPrizes.advantage1Desc: All bets and draws are recorded on the blockchain. You can audit everything.
QuinaBetPrizes.advantage2Desc: Prizes go directly to your wallet. No company keeps the money.
QuinaBetPrizes.ctaDesc: Place your bet on Quina-Bet and have a chance to win the maximum prize.
